Name: Flannel Amethyst
About the game: STORY: Join Franka in Flannel Amethyst; a 3D platformer game featuring ten different levels and 2 different chasing enemies. Explore 10 different levels with varying missions such as collecting all gems or killing all enemies. Double jump and airdash your way through various levels and use your burst to reach greater heights. Finish missions to collect Steam achievements. FEATURES: - 10 different levels - Varying objectives; platforming, fighting, or collecting gems - 2 different enemies. Kill them with club - Double Jumping and Airdashing - A Roll with invulnerability - A Burst mechanic that restores your Airdash and Double Jump - Gems that fill the Action Gauge - Steam achievements
